display_long_description:
Challenge players online or solo with Conquest mode in this immersive collectible card-battler. Dragon Front Rising mixes high fantasy with World War II on a 4x4 grid battlefield that is alive with rampaging giants, intimidating war-machines, and soaring projectiles.

* Collectible Cards – Construct your 30 card deck from over 500 battle-hardened soldiers, fortifications that evolve the battlefield, and a wide array of spells.

* Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest Pro users can enjoy Dragon Front Rising in cutting edge Mixed Reality (MR).

* Online Multiplayer – Challenge your friends, or online armies, and climb through the competitive ranks for rewards.

* 7 Thematically Diverse Factions – Each army is equipped with unique powers, traits and strategies, and powerful Champions. 

* Champion System – Legendary champions helm your army to ensure an epic come-back in the late minutes of every game.

* Test your decks in Conquest Mode, playing against a relentless AI campaign to take control of the realm.
